ko.title: 35½ 시스템
ko.description: CO와 3C가 같은 시스템값을 공유하는 제한 구간 앵글 시스템. 1C는 반대편 장쿠션에 형성된다.

en.title: 35&½ System
en.description: A domain-limited angle system where CO and 3C share the same system scale and 1C is formed on the opposite long cushion.

formula_concept.text: 1C is conceptually derived from CO and 3C using the 35&½ relation.
formula_concept.note: This is a conceptual description only. All actual computation rules live in derivations/35half.rules.json.

tip.note: Spin and tip are fixed per track direction.

hints_ko: 35~45 구간은 시스템 비정의 영역이며 계산 시 clamp 됩니다.

domains.note: The system is not defined in the gap (35,45); values are clamped to nearest valid bound.

ssot_roles: derivations/35half.rules.json : all computation, interpolation, clamp rules
